inventory.commentary: Revised PENN file combined groups 1,3. Added examples, added commentary, modified definitions. ahouston. 26sep06, added dummy sense 3. ahouston

sense.name: an amount of monetary gain
sense.commentary: PROFIT[+quantity][+gain][+monetary] net income, net, net profit, lucre, profit, earnings, gain - the excess of revenues over outlays in a given period of time
sense.examples: These investors are looking for a quick profit. George only made a twenty dollar profit each year on his crafts. Trading was heavy today on Wall Street from profit taking. Their gross profit margins are being squeezed by increased competition.

sense.name: general benefit or value of something
sense.commentary: PROFIT[+quality][+beneficial] the advantageous quality of being beneficial
sense.examples: I hope there is some profit in your seeing this play. There's no profit in screaming at referees from the bench. What's the profit of visiting the doctor if you won't take his advice.
